channel.title: Dialogue Problem

item.title: Dialogue Problem
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. I added dialogue, and it appears, and everything is good. But, in dialogue.cfg, when I add an option to go somewhere, it opens up the PIN settings or nothing happens. I have it like this atm.

[code]//npc speaks
//---------id—type----nextdia-dialoguetext1-------------------------------------------dialoguetext2-------------------dialoguetext3
dialogue = 3 1 4 Hello. I_see_you_want_to_wear_a_Rune_Platebody_or_D’Hide_Body_Armor. I_suppose_I_can_help_you._But,_you_must_give_me_something_in_return. EMPTY
dialogue = 5 1 6 Okay._Listen_up._I_have_a_friend_named_Oziach. He_used_to_be_a_blacksmith,_but_then_he_became_dangerous. So,_anyways,_he_can_help_you.
dialogue = 6 1 0 Good_Luck!! EMPTY EMPTY

//player speaks (same as 1)
//---------id—type----nextdia-dialoguetext1-------------------------------------------dialoguetext2-------------------dialoguetext3

//player must choose
//---------id—type----nexto1–nexto2–nexto3–swclose-swfar—question------------------------option1-----------------------------------------option2-----------------------------------------option3
dialogue = 4 2 5 0 0 1 0 Help_Or_No? Okay_What_is_it? Nevermind_I_dont_feel_like_helping_right_now. EMPTY 5

[ENDOFDIALOGUELIST][/code]
How come it wont have the Okay What is it? go to dialogue number 5? Thanks for all your help!

PS:Please dont bother posting if you dont know

Read full topic
